## ArrayItem type

Get the item type from an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type ArrayItem<T extends readonly unknown[]> = T extends ReadonlyArray<
  infer Item
>
  ? Item
  : never
```

## Example


```ts
// Expect: number
type Foo = ArrayItem<number[]>
```
